bibl.title: ‘3mew and Boukoloi: Exploring a Pattern in Greco-Egyptian Fiction.
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II
bibl.author: RUTHERFORD, Ian

bibl.note: Discusses a parallel motif found in Greek and Egyptian fiction. This is the parallel between the boukoloi, the shepherd-outlaws of the Greek novel, and the ‘3m.w-shepherds of Asiatics of the Petubastis Cycle.
RUTHERFORD Ian, ‘3mew and Boukoloi: Exploring a Pattern in Greco-Egyptian Fiction.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1145-1153.
